edu.nd.darts.cimon
Class LocationService

java.lang.Object
  edu.nd.darts.cimon.MetricService<Double>
      edu.nd.darts.cimon.LocationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
LocationListener, ObservableUpdate
public final class LocationService
extends MetricService<Double>
implements LocationListener

Monitoring service for geo-location sensors. Uses GPS and cellular triangulation data to obtain geo-location. Location metrics:

  • Latitude (degrees)
  • Longitude (degrees)
  • Accuracy (meters)

    Author:
    darts
    See Also:
    MetricService

    getLastLocation

    private Location getLastLocation()
    Obtain last known location. Queries GPS and network data for last known locations. Returns the location which is most accurate or recent, using a formula which essentially equates one second to one meter.

    Returns:
    best last known location

    checkLocation

    private boolean checkLocation(Location newCoordinate)
    Update location with new coordinate if it is better quality than existing location. Checks validity of new coordinates and compares it to existing location. If it is of higher quality (based on accuracy and age), update location to new coordinate.

    Parameters:
    newCoordinate - new coordinate obtained from onLocationChanged callback
    Returns:
    true if location was set to new coordinate, false if new coordinate is invalid or considered lesser quality

    updateValues

    private void updateValues()
    Update metric values based on recently updated location value.

    performUpdates

    protected void performUpdates()
    Description copied from class: MetricService
    Perform updates and scheduling necessary after internal update of values. This method should be called or overridden following the internal update of values by all subclasses of MetricService. For example, this may be called at the end of MetricService.getMetricInfo() following the update of values.

    Overrides:
    performUpdates in class MetricService<Double>

    getMetricValue

    Object getMetricValue(int metric)
    Description copied from class: MetricService
    Obtain current value of metric, or null if not currently available. Subclasses may override this to provide custom response, including fetching fresh values before returning.

    Overrides:
    getMetricValue in class MetricService<Double>
    Parameters:
    metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics) to acquire
    Returns:
    current value of metric, or null if not available

    insertClient

    void insertClient(int metric,
                  int monitorId,
                  long period,
                  long duration,
                  boolean eavesdrop,
                  Messenger callback)
    Description copied from class: MetricService
    Insert new periodic monitor into metric management node (CurrentNode). This method is called from MetricService.registerClient(int, int, long, long, boolean, Messenger). Subclasses of MetricService may override this method if special action is needed to handle inserting periodic monitor.

    Overrides:
    insertClient in class MetricService<Double>
    Parameters:
    metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics) to monitor
    monitorId - unique id of monitor, used for database logging
    period - period between updates (milliseconds), if eavesdrop is true this will represent the maximum allowable period between updates
    duration - duration to monitor (in milliseconds), 0 for continuous
    eavesdrop - if true, will provide updates as frequently as they are available due to any active monitors
    callback - messenger for client callback handler to handle periodic updates

    removeClient

    void removeClient(int metric,
                  int monitorId)
    Description copied from class: MetricService
    Remove periodic monitor from metric management node (CurrentNode). This method is called from MetricService.unregisterClient(int, int). Subclasses of MetricService may override this method if special action is needed to handle removing periodic monitor.

    Overrides:
    removeClient in class MetricService<Double>
    Parameters:
    metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics) of registered monitor
    monitorId - unique id used to register the periodic monitor in MetricService.registerClient(int, int, long, long, boolean, Messenger)

    insertEvent

    void insertEvent(int metric,
                 int monitorId,
                 Object threshold,
                 long period,
                 ExpressionNode enode,
                 boolean max)
    Description copied from class: MetricService
    Insert new condition monitor into metric management node (CurrentNode). This method is called from MetricService.registerEvent(int, int, Object, long, ExpressionNode, boolean). Subclasses of MetricService may override this method if special action is needed to handle inserting condition monitor.

    Overrides:
    insertEvent in class MetricService<Double>
    Parameters:
    metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics) to monitor
    monitorId - unique id of monitor, used for database logging
    threshold - threshold value to monitor for this metric
    period - period between updates, in milliseconds
    enode - expression node which is registering the condition
    max - true if threshold is a maximum threshold, false for minimum threshold

    removeEvent

    void removeEvent(int metric,
                 int monitorId,
                 boolean max)
    Description copied from class: MetricService
    Remove condition monitor from metric management node (CurrentNode). This method is called from MetricService.unregisterEvent(int, int, boolean). Subclasses of MetricService may override this method if special action is needed to handle removing condition monitor.

    Overrides:
    removeEvent in class MetricService<Double>
    Parameters:
    metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics) of registered monitor
    monitorId - unique id used to register the condition
    max - true if registered threshold was maximum threshold, false if threshold was minimum threshold
